data.name: Vengeance Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Discord


About the Game

Vengeance: Supporter Pack


We are very thankful for the community we build via Discord/Steam. With this pack, you join the supporter club for Vengeance to help us make great games in the future. You'll get the following content for buying this pack (We will add more content in the future):
CONTENT:
  • New M4A1 Variant (Same Animation/Reload Speed/Damage etc.)
  • Vengeance Supporter Callsign
  • Golden Name
data.about_the_game:
Vengeance: Supporter Pack


We are very thankful for the community we build via Discord/Steam. With this pack, you join the supporter club for Vengeance to help us make great games in the future. You'll get the following content for buying this pack (We will add more content in the future):
CONTENT:
  • New M4A1 Variant (Same Animation/Reload Speed/Damage etc.)
  • Vengeance Supporter Callsign
  • Golden Name
data.short_description: We are very thankful for the community we build via Discord/Steam. With this pack, you join the supporter club for Vengeance to help us make great games in the future. You'll get a few in-game items as a thank you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher; 64 bit version
  • Processor: A CPU released in the last few years
  • Memory: 5 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit version IS required to play the game!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10; 64 bit version
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790K
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit version IS required to play the game!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: OpenGLCore Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit version IS required to play the game!
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: OpenGLCore Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit version IS required to play the game!
